title: Safety
content:
Safety

State Regulations
§ 1220.30 - Permission required to bring into or carry firearms or other weapons in terminal; exceptions
§ 1220.31 - Permission required to bring into or carry explosives, acids, inflammables, compressed gases, etc. in terminal; exceptions
§ 1220.32 - Permission required to use inflammable liquids for cleaning at terminal
§ 1220.33 - Smoking or carrying lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, etc. in certain areas of terminal prohibited
§ 1220.34 - Unauthorized interference with or use of terminal systems or equipment prohibited
§ 1220.35 - All persons required to exercise care to avoid or prevent injury to persons or damage to property
§ 1220.36 - Permission and accompaniment by Port Authority employee required for entry into certain areas

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
